title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Reconciling with a colleague or friend sets you both up to move on without any emotional baggage. Perhaps you each find it easier to release a grudge while hot Mars finds his cool from a smooth trine to transformative Pluto. Embrace the present exactly as it is today, regardless of how long ago you had your differences. Taking the high road inspires others to do the same. South African activist Alan Paton said, It is not forgive and forget as if nothing wrong had ever happened, but forgive and go forward. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
